title: ISimpleFilletFeatureData2.SetDistance
description: Sets the Distance 2 radius at the specified item of this asymmetric fillet/chamfer.
signature:
void SetDistance( 
   System.Object
PFilletItem
,
   System.Double
Dist2
)

parameters.name: PFilletItem
parameters.description: Item at which to set the Distance 2 radius

parameters.name: Dist2
parameters.description: Distance 2 radius of the asymmetric fillet/chamfer at PFilletItem

remarks:
Call
ISimpleFilletFeatureData2::SetRadius
to set the Distance 1 radius.
